summary: A small script that makes running to consume stamina.
descriptionHtml:
=Stamina Rush=

A small script that makes running to consume stamina.

Requires ScriptDragon.
http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/Files/tes/

It seems odd to me that my bookworm-mage can run like a wild deer for unlimited amount of time and carry 270 pts of stuff at the same time. So i wrote it mostly for myself, since i found nothing like this on amongst other mods. Try it and tell me if it\'s worth.
Report if you see a bug, maybe i\'ll fix it.

v.0.2 = fixed stamina issue on fasttravel

=Features=
 - Running doesn\'t consume stamina when in combat state - consider this effect as adrenaline surge.
 - If your stamina is close to 0 you\'ll have no chance to run until restore your forces. It works in battle too, so abusing power attacks with low stamina will make you an easy target.
 - You can adjust difficulty by changing the value of multiplier in the ini. Note that it is quite sensible though.

=Installing=
Copy the contents of archive into your Skyrim folder, or Skyrim\\asi depending on what do you use.

=Thanks=
Bethesda for Skyrim
Alexander Blade for ScriptDragon


Merry Christmas!
Alex.
author: alexanid
